description: Exposure of an archived object to preservation plans results in loss or damage to one or more of its significant characteristics.
mitigationStrategy:
Avoidance strategies:
- Evaluate preservation strategies in testbed environment prior to execution
- Ensure procedures are reversible in the event of unexpected or inappropriate results In the event of risk’s execution:
- Define policies to describe the acceptable levels of loss tolerated by the repository
name: Preservation strategies result in information loss
notes: - Does repository offer a definition of acceptable loss that may result from preservation activities?
preMitigationNotes: - Repository’s proposed migration strategy results in loss of ‘look and feel’ of archived documents, regarded as essential properties by user community
